metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20919 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the DBI module before 1.643 for Perl. Thehv_fetch() documentation requires checking for NULL and the code does that.But, shortly thereafter, it calls SvOK(profile), causing a NULL pointerdereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbi-perl - 1.643-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.643-1').
